tool_description: Provides information about Artwork from the museum of Chicago.
title: artchicago

api_list.name: artworks
api_list.description: A list of all artworks sorted by last updated date in descending order.

required_parameters.name: limit
required_parameters.description: The number of resources to return per page

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page of resources to retrieve

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return per resource
